EmailTemplate.name: LCM Password Change Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
#if ( $launcher != $identityName && $launcher != "SailPointContextRequestFilter" ) $launcher requested the following password changes be made to your account(s). #else The following password changes were made to your account(s) at your request. #end
#if ( $approvalSet.items ) #foreach ($item in $approvalSet.items) Application: $item.applicationName #if ( $item.nativeIdentity ) Account : $item.nativeIdentity #end #if ( $item.instance ) Instance : $item.instance #end Operation: $item.operation #if ( $item.displayName ) Attribute: $item.displayName #elseif ( $item.name ) Attribute: $item.name #end #if ( $item.displayValue) Value(s): $item.displayValue #end #if ( $item.requesterComments ) Requester Comments: $item.requesterComments #end #end #end
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying user's when their password has been changed. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: approvalSet
Argument.Description: The ApprovalSet object contained in the workflow.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Password Changes to $identityDisplayName
